greetings: Hello! 👋 How can I help you today on KabaleOnline?
Oraire ota! 😊 Need help buying, selling, or renting?

faq.how to post: To post, click the 'Post Item' button on the homepage and fill in your details.
faq.rent house: 🏠 You can browse rentals under the 'Rentals' tab — updated daily.
faq.sell item: 🛍️ Selling? Go to 'Post Item' and upload your photo, price, and contact.
